reviews.review_text: Regular Udupi restaurant. Food quality is good. Service is excellent. We had Veg Hyderabadi with Chapati and Butter milk it was delicious. Masala papad was tasty.

Food was very good. Service was quick. The staff was kind. You will get the taste of the south.
The food items like varieties of halwa, laddo available at the billing counter were also good.

Udapi Pure Veg: A Taste of Tradition
Nestled along the bustling Panji Ponda Road, Udapi Pure Veg is a culinary gem that transports you to the heart of South Indian cuisine. This unassuming eatery offers a simple yet satisfying menu that is sure to leave you craving more.

The moment you step inside, you're greeted by a warm and inviting atmosphere. The aroma of freshly ground spices fills the air, setting the stage for a delightful dining experience. The menu is a treasure trove of classic South Indian dishes, from fluffy idlis and crispy dosas to aromatic curries and flavorful biryanis.
I was particularly impressed by the masala dosa. The crepe was thin and crispy, filled with a flavorful potato masala that was perfectly spiced. The accompanying sambar and coconut chutney complemented the dosa beautifully. For those with a sweet tooth, the kesari bath is a must-try. This sweet vermicelli pudding is rich, creamy, and bursting with flavor.

The service at Udapi Pure Veg is efficient and friendly. The staff is always happy to recommend dishes or answer any questions. While the restaurant may not be the fanciest place in town, the quality of the food and the warm hospitality make it a truly special dining experience.

If you're looking for a taste of authentic South Indian cuisine in Old Goa, Udapi Pure Veg is a must-visit. The simple yet delicious food, warm atmosphere, and friendly service make it a hidden gem that is well worth seeking out.
I highly recommend Udapi Pure Veg to anyone looking for a delicious and affordable meal. It's a place that I will definitely be returning to in the future.

* Price:
Udapi Pure Veg is very affordable. You can expect to pay around â‚¹200-300 for a meal for two.

* Ambience:
The restaurant is simple and unpretentious. It's a good place to enjoy a casual meal with friends or family.

* Service:
The service at Udapi Pure Veg is efficient and friendly. The staff is always happy to help.

* Location:
The restaurant is located on Panji Ponda Road, near the Old Goa Church.

* Timings:
The restaurant is open from 7 am to 10:30 pm every day.
Overall, I had a fantastic experience at Udapi Pure Veg. It's a great place to enjoy delicious South Indian food in a relaxed and friendly atmosphere. I highly recommend this restaurant to anyone visiting Old Goa.
